title: Can climate tech startups supercharge the UK's net-zero journey? Solivus brings in £2.4 million to show how with its ultra-thin solar panel - Tech.eu
content: Can climate tech startups supercharge the UK's net-zero journey? Solivus brings in £2.4 million to show how with its ultra-thin solar panel  Tech.eu
description: UK startup Solivus has now raised £2.4 million funding
